review: Love it.  A lot more functional than chromecast and a lot faster.  Bought second one for non smart tv.  Once it goes on sale again will buy another just to have around.
author: carlosvcollado

review: It worked great, no problems . Happy with the product😊.
author: rsgfgfx

review: Great addition to any entertainment system.
author: Eric garnett

review: I really love the fire stick. It's very easy to use. Much easier than the Chrome. I like having a remote control and it doesn't require you to use a device. I also like that it keeps your history which makes future browsing a breeze.
author: S. Wang-bandago "Zainab"

review: Gave this to my daughter for Christmas and she absolutely loves the ease of using instead of going thru a box
author: sheila maillet expensive but works

review: it took me over one month to receive it.  when i ordered it  you did not indicate you had a backlog.
author: DON BYRNE

review: Somewhat disappointed in performance as compared to Apple TV and Apple TV isn't that great either!
author: Garnett R. Stowe Jr
